title: Anthropic announces $50B investment in new US data centers to meet AI demand
description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.
Anthropic, maker of the chatbot Claude, said it is wo... [1508 chars]

title: Google's 'moonshot' project would put AI data centers in space
description: Google is exploring a “moonshot” plan to build artificial intelligence data centers in space – the latest move in its ongoing scramble to keep pace with OpenAI and other rivals.
content:
Google is exploring a “moonshot” plan to build artificial intelligence data centers in space – the latest move in its ongoing scramble to keep pace with OpenAI and other rivals.

title: AIR Launches AI in Education Network to Advance Research on How Artificial Intelligence Is Changing K-12 Education
description: Six new studies will generate new evidence on how AI is being used and how to maximize the potential benefits of AI in teaching, learning, and educator decisionmaking in schools
content:

title: Gore Verbinski has something to say about the AI apocalypse.
description:
In Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die, a strange man (Sam Rockwell) needs everyone in a diner to believe that he’s really from a future where humanity has been all but destroyed artificial intelligence. His story’s wild, but to people living in 2025, it’s not all that hard to believe. Movie’s out February 13th.
[Media: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CaSxNAZUKsM]

title: Inside Delhi Jal Board's Pact With IIT Kanpur
description: Delhi's water system is getting a technological upgrade. The Delhi Jal Board (DJB) has tied up with IIT Kanpur's Airawat Research Foundation to introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Digital Twin technology into the water management network.
